name: Valencia Rhodes
text: Mr. Reese is such nice and kind person. He worked extremely hard to put all my fears, concerns and worries to rest. He asked all my questions.

name: Dirk Diggler
text: Bond & Botes are professionals in every aspect of any bankruptcy law. Suzanne Shinn is a fantastic attorney but she’s also compassionate towards her clients. Im sure in all her years of service she’s seen it all. She has a way of letting you know it’s gonna be ok and when you get through this you will be able to get on your correct financial path. Thank you again!

name: John Gates
text: So far the attorney has been great.  I still have yet to pay but I’m sure once I do they will be great.

name: Selena Anderson
text: Highly recommend to anyone. All I did was ask questions,sent a a few emails. Fast response time..

name: Deborah Cooper
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly people. Helped me so much

name: Cory Wynn
text: Great people to work with I'm glad I called them

name: Susan Bennett
text:
Very fortunate to have found this law firm. This is my second time working with them, and I am so pleased. They take very stressful and heart wrenching situations and fix them. I am so relieved knowing they are my representation.
Courteous , patient, kind, and professional.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ms. Bennett!

name: Starbuck Anderson
text: Bond and Botes's representatives were polite and very patient while I asked my many questions, even when l asked some multiple times. Top notch in my opinion.

resp.text: Thank you very much and please let us know if you have any additional questions! :-)

name: Henry Richard
text: The staff was very professional, efficient, patient, and accommodating. They were in constant communication with me throughout the process. They are a great value for the excellent level of service provided.

name: Sharon Parker
text: I feel at ease knowing that my situation is in good hands.  Everyone I've talked with is very nice and takes the time to listen to what you have to say.  I like that I can sign or fill out forms online. I can even communicate  with the office through text  message.

name: Lin D. Hall
text:
They Are Fantastic! This Law Group Is Outstanding And I Would Recommend Them To Anyone. Mr. Wineachter was my Legal Advisor and Ashley & Becky was my Office Team advisors. What An Awesome Group They Were To Work With Too!
“Thank You & May God Bless Each Of You Mighty”

name: Joy Starr
text: Mr. Reese was so nice and made me at ease, I was very nervous going in, all of the office staff I dealt with were nice, friendly and handled all of my concerns.

name: Keosha Nix
text: My experience  was by far one of the best customer service  experiences  I've  had in a while! Monica made me feel like she and I had known each other for years!!! I didn't  feel like a number I felt like I mattered. Going in, I was unsure and super nervous, let's say by the end my appointment I have a new found confidence because of Monica and all other members  of the staff!! Thanks so much, I'm so happy with my decision!

resp.text: Thank you for such a nice review, Keosha!  Please rest assured that neither you or any of the other folks who come to see us will ever be treated like "numbers". We try to treat people who come to see us like family and I am so glad that you felt our care and concern.  Brad Botes

name: Hime Enchanted
text: Absolutely wonderful experience! It couldn’t have been any easier. All my questions were answered in a timely manner. I was helped every step of the way.

name: Jan P
text: I give the office staff four stars. This was my first initial meeting and everyone I encountered was so welcoming and professional. The lawyer I met with was very knowledgeable,helpful and reassuring. I have every confidence that Bond,Notes,Reese& Shinn was a great choice to help me thru this time if adversity.

resp.text: Thank you! We really appreciate your review and kind words.

name: R A Jones
text: The  staff and attorneys at Bond and Botes were very professional and compassionate with me during this most difficult time of my life

name: car404me
text: The staff is very polite and helpful. Made my bankruptcy very easy.

name: Phil Massa
text: The service by all staff members has been so helpful and prompt going out of their way to provide counsel in a calming fashion during a tense period of life. I am truly grateful for their service!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review, Phil.  We remind ourselves regularly that we wouldn't be here without good people like you and it is an honor to serve you.

name: Tammie Quinn
text: It Felt very good to have such a honest and  reliable group of people behind me.

name: Karen Mealing
text: All the above, very professional! come highly recommended.

name: Sandra C Harris
text: I was really amazed at the professional atmospher from the phone call to the signing in to the consultation. Mrs. Monica was so kind professional and understanding of my needs.She took her time and explained all my questions i ask. Grest experience great emplyees and awesome results. I recommend this company to anyone in need of their services.

resp.text: Thank you Sandra!  We really appreciate your kind review!

name: DArius Roberson
text: Professional and knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend

name: Jenny Weems
text: Awesome lawyers! Second time using them. Always makes me feel at ease no matter what kind of situation I've been in. Thanks guys!!!

name: Tynese McKinley
text: Ms. Reese response soon as possible and she has gave me the help that I needed.

name: 205 Yoshi
text: Great atmosphere.. Excellent at what they do

name: Vanessa Knox
text: I was overwhelmed in debt and was stressed out to the point that it was affecting my health. I got a mailer with the bonds and Botes, I called made an appointment, as as I talk with them I felt relieved that professional were handling my debt problems.

name: Kirk Petty
text: The moment I spoke to the attorney it was evident he had a genuine interest in my best interests!

resp.text: Thank you, Kirk! And yes, meeting our client's best interests is always our goal!

name: Brenda Taylor
text: It was great. I was a nervous wreck and Mr. Reese made it so that. I was relaxed and not so worried when. I left. I am so glad I chose this law firm.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Brenda!  We really appreciate your kind words!

name: Chad Pinnow
text: I was referred to Bond & Botes by one of my wife's friends.  I was very hesitant to follow thru with the process of bankruptcy as I was raised to satisfy my obligations. After 15 years of trying, I realized I couldn't do this on my own.  Brad put my mind at ease in the first few minutes of our consultation.  As painful as this process can be, Bond & Botes did everything in there power to keep me calm and on the straight and narrow path to financial freedom.  Their guidance and assistance in our case was the best that it could have been.  Pam also did an exceptional job keeping me up to date as our case progressed.  My wife and I are extremely excited to get this "fresh" start and would recommend Bond & Botes to anyone.  They provided outstanding customer service and professionalism, along with the ability to calm me down when my stress level was at it's peak.  I would definitely use them again for any legal issues I may come across in the future.

name: Shabree Perry
text: The staff is really nice and super helpful

name: Karen Means
text: They have been very professional and easy to talk to Really seems interested in hrlping me.

resp.text: Thank you very much Karen! Please know that we really are interested in helping you and everyone who comes to us seeking help. We appreciate your kind review.

name: William K Jones
text: What a relief. To have this process explained so clearly. Both attorneys, Grafton Weinacker and Robert Reese were very easy to talk to and Ashley was also very helpful. I only wish I had contacted them sooner. It would havs saved us from a lot of sleepless nights .

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Mr. Jones.  We do our best to provide the best legal services possible for our clients and it is good to hear nice words like yours.

name: Alicia Coleman
text: Prompt action. Caring law firm.

resp.text: Thank you, Alicia!  It means a lot when someone takes the time to leave a kind review. We are grateful!

name: Erika Hill
text: If you need a great firm please use Bond, Botes, reese & Shinn I had a great experience with this firm.

name: Kathy Blackmon
text: Very professional and everyone is nice.

name: Andrea Caison
text: On Monday, January 11, 2019, I called the office of Bond, Botes Reese & Shinn PC approximately at 8:22 a.m. and was pleasantly greeted by Ashley Wesley!  She provided prompt, professional, and EXCELLENT customer service and made my day!!!!!

name: Theodore Campbell
text: Excellent, very simple, easy to understand, very kind, Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Campbell. We really appreciate the nice review.

name: Melissa Worthey
text: Everybody was so professional and very nice.  I'd recommend them any day !!!

name: Jennifer Snell
text: They have been so great working with me and my budget and getting things done for me quickly.

name: Angela Hayes
text: Mr. Weinacker was very thorough and pleasant.

name: Donald Love
text: Had a great experience with the lawyers

name: Rashial Scott
text: Mr. Reese was so informative and was so patient with my little one as well. If you need a good bankruptcy lawyer, this is the place to come.

name: Jay h
text: These guys are awsome!!!! They walked me thorough the whole processs and put my mind at ease. Thanks guys!!!

name: Nicole Wallace
text: BOTES was such a jerk and so rude! All he wanted was money! Talked down to client and was not helpful at all.

resp.text: We are sorry that you were not satisfied with your experience. We strive to assist all our clients in the best manner possible to meet their needs.

name: Sharon Calhoun
text: They are super kind and courteous! Made the whole Bankruptcy process less stressful for me!

name: Shirley Cunningham
text: Great group of people.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Cunningham!  We really appreciate your nice review.

name: John Turner
text: Our experience with the partners and staff has been exceptional

name: VELMA G COSBY
text: Gave me a piece of mind..

name: Olen Fitts
text: My financial matters were handled professionally and I would recommend Bond Botes Reese Shinn to all my associates

name: Candace Roberson
text: Very helpful. Wonderful staff.

name: Stacey Bearden
text: Robert Reese is s lifesaver! We went to Bond Botes Reese and Shinn expecting the worst but came out feeling completely relieved, he walked us through the process step by step and I've felt so at easy

name: Kristin Gore
text: Great experience all the way around

name: Amber Russell
text: They are awesome

name: SF Alvarado
text: Very helpful in legal advice, eased my mind, the best firm to work with real people with money problems or medical problems.

name: Jodi Benton
text: Great law firm and suburb staff,

name: Dustin Defnall
text: Simply exceptional!

name: NAs NAs
text: very rude, very impatient and greedy...wanted $2k just to contact another lawyer to have them settle an account i have

name: Vinetta Yow
text: Very concerned & caring.
